content.description: Monstro is the stunning line that attracted all the initial development of the area. Start with some big jugs to reach the 3rd bolt. Perform an amazing, right-trending traverse through a beautiful seam to a crappy kneebar rest. From here, launch into a series of underclings and sidepulls (crux) to gain the less overhanging headwall. A final 5.12 crux will test your redpoint determination.
content.location: This is on the right side of the Amphitheatre.

content.description: Start with some less than desirable rock to reach the 1st bolt above the rap anchor. Layback up the dihedral feature until you can surf core-sucking kneebars to the capped roof. There's a brief rest at the lip of the overhang before engaging in technical, thin face climbing up the awesome headwall to the anchor.
content.location: This is dead center off the ledge.

content.description: Start with a reachy move getting past a short, right-facing corner. Continue on big holds to the crux above the black chickenhead. A decent rest leads to a short traverse back right before the anchor.
content.location: It is on the left side of the ledge at the Amphitheatre.
